content.meta_title: Verification of {{Signaturetype}} signatures for {{Fileformat}} files via {{ProgLang}}
content.meta_description: Use only a few lines of {{ProductName}} code to verify {{Fileformat}} documents and their {{Signaturetype}} signatures.
content.h2: API for {{ProductName}} provides opportunity to verify {{Signaturetype}} signatures at {{Fileformat}} documents. Verification of e-signatures inside your {{Fileformat}} documents might be performed quickly and easily.

about.title: Discover new {{ProductFullName}} API features
about.content: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) API provides wide range of ways to process numerous documents formats by using electronic signatures. Many types of digital signatures as texts, images, digital certificates, barcodes, QR-codes, stamps or metadata are supported. Customers can add, remove, edit, validate or search digital signatures at PDFs, MS Word documents, MS Excel workbooks, MS PowerPoint presentations, Adobe Photoshop files and various image formats. Astonishing number of additional features and settings are available.

steps.title_left: How to validate {{Signaturetype}} signatures in your {{Fileformat}} document

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) includes useful features like verification of {{Signaturetype}} signatures placed at {{Fileformat}} documents. Use this opportunity without implementing extra code.
content_left.step_1: Firstly, instantiate Signature class providing as a constructor parameter path to a document which is supposed to be verified.
content_left.step_2: Secondly, create a new VerifyOptions object and set up all required properties.
content_left.step_3: Finally, invoke Signature's object Verify method passing VerifyOptions instance.

content_right.description: {{ProductFullName}} are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, please make sure that you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_right.step_1: Operating systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
content_right.step_3: Download the latest version of {{ProductFullName}} from [{{RepoName}}]({{RepoUrl}})

demos.title: Signing with {{Signaturetype}} signatures Live Demo
demos.content: Add various electronic signatures to {{Fileformat}} file right now by visiting the [GroupDocs.Signature App](https://products.groupdocs.app/signature/family) website.

more_formats.title: Verify other {{Signaturetype}} signatures using {{ProgLang}}
more_formats.content: Verification of electronic signatures placed in various documents. Check quality of signatures in the popular file formats as revealed below.
